website_summaries.verdict: If your budget is your top concern and you don't require extreme power, this one is worth considering.
pros: An affordable model that's ideal for minor jobs such as blade sharpening and surface prepping
cons: The on/off switch has been reported to stick
The gears have been known to malfunction during heavy-duty tasks
Spanner wrench is flimsy and may bend

customer_reviews.title: but I'm going to look at others as the design is poor. The screws holding the black to the grey ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for me, but I'm going to look at others as the design is poor. The screws holding the black to the grey part of the head come loose constantly causing grease to leak and the gears to not engage. Happened about 8 months after purchase. Has been difficult to email in about it to customer service. Not sure how it can be remedied. Maybe mine is just a fluke. But when it works it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Connor B

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power for a little money
customer_reviews.text: I've used Black and Decker for years, and I have always loved the quality. This Grinder has a lot of power, for the money you are getting a great deal. Mine came in orange, so if you are really picky about what color your tools are (I dont see any reason why, but some people think it is the end of the world) just be warned that it may not show up in the black displayed in the picture. I am very pleased with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazon Car Guy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a quality made product.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the opportunity to use this grinder once to grind down some welds, but based on my limited use I would say the grinder performed as well as possible. My only complaint regarding this tool is the size of the rear body. It is somewhat bulky. People with small hands or short fingers may have trouble keeping a firm grip on the tool during extended use. It may become fatiguing to their hand and arm. Other than that, the grinder is a breeze to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this thing once, and it worked fine. I specifically bought it to cut rock with a diamond blade, which would not work with this grinder out of the box, as any flat blade catches the guard. To fix this, I got DeWALT 4-12" Backing Flange from Home Depot for about $3 and put it between the original inner flange and the wheel. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.  Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good product. Solid. A bit heavy (but that speaks to a strong motor, so I don't mark it down for the weight. This one has higher marks (better reviews) than the one that replaces it. Seems to be how tools are going these days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This thing has earned it's keep! I have cut ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has earned it's keep! I have cut metal, cement board and concrete . A lot of concrete! I cut pilot cuts for drainage in my patio as well as two 36 x 46 egress windows in a concrete basement and it's still ticking. I use my compressor to blow the dust out of it very often.
customer_reviews.author: handyhusband

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit scary using it since the button can easily be pushed into the "always locked on mode"
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful enough to grind away at steel brackets and bolts but it is a bit scary using it since the button can easily be pushed into the "always locked on mode". If it ever catches and flys out of my hand while the button is locked I would have a flying, spinning grinder of death possibly heading straight for my arms or toes.
customer_reviews.author: EvanC.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a replacement for one that I borrowed in January of this year. This grinder is not meant for continual use in a heavy industrial environment, although it sustained a great deal of abuse before it started to come apart. Hours and hours of grinding and flap-disc buffing took its toll. The one I was using still actually works but the button to lock the spindle so you can remove wheels and/or disks is now missing and it vibrates quite a bit but still runs. For home usage you probably cannot beat this one for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Beuck

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: In a few times of use, it was burned. First, it smelled as if some electrical wire has lost its insolation. After some time, it stoped to work. There was no use to send it to be fixed. I threw it out in the recyclable trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan T. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality little grinder
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality little grinder. Hasen't skipped a beat so far. My only complaint is the on switch is hard to lock in the on position sometimes, but that is a very minor gripe. Pro tip: BUY A FACE SHIELD. Not just glasses but safety glasses and a face shield!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: B & D Angle grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grinder. It replaced the Best Name Brand Grinder on the market that burned up after one year of light service. I have not had this one long but so far I like it better than the most expensive one on the market. It runs smoother, and never kicks off on over load and is much easier to handle. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell N. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very easy to use. It is light, and the wheel turning acts like a gyroscope, steadying it. It cuts, grinds, sands and anything else you could think of without boging down. It was also very cheap. It is high quality and I expect it to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: william ackley

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: if you are in the market for grinders buy this brand ,Black and Decker are the founder and maker of Dewalt ,but Black and Decker is much better build and better price ,last longer them Dewalt we have several, we had for years we use daily heavy, cut thru tile and stone.
customer_reviews.author: antonino di salvo

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this saw
customer_reviews.text: The cheap grinder that could. Very pleased, I've been using it regularly, almost always as a cutoff tool, have yet to find its limitations on things it can cut. Great tool for the price, I'd recommend it to anyone short of a construction worker.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Grinder For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This thing came brand new in the box even though it was listed as gently used, took it our and was grinding away the next day. This has pretty good torque, but not so much as to make it hard to handle. The price was great. Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Gor-D

customer_reviews.title: double the amps
customer_reviews.text: used harbor freight grinder for 30 yrs til it blew up. building another bike, bought 2 more from them- JUNK! both blew up in a couple weeks. This B&D grinder is double the amps (more power) and not a lot more $. Solid construction too.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied CustomerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now and have used it several times. It works great and will do most anything you would want it to do. I have had no problems with it and would not hesitate to buy another on, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Essenbe

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. If you are going to be using this a lot then go with a better brand. If it is a tool that you just need occasionally then it is perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what a more expensive would do better. This one has plenty of power and Ive used it for all sorts of jobs. Sharpens lawn mower blades perfect right out of the box with included blade. Ive cut through concrete with another blade. Nice tool
customer_reviews.author: Orlandoguy82

customer_reviews.title: not top of the line, but for that price.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut some small rebar and sharpen my lawn mower blades occasionally. I used it twice and it worked well (managed to sharpen the bladed well enough to cut myself). Had ample power and came with a cutter/grinder disk and the tool needed to install the grinder discs. Installing the first grinder was a bit hard because of the booklet was not really very helpful. There is an arresting switch on top of the grinder which you need to press if you want to open the disk holder. Just look for it. If you are a better handy-woman-man-person then me I am sure you did know that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: The West got me

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as other grinders. Not as flashy. But for only $30 shipped who can complain! Did an GREAT job of grinding off my rusted muffler flange, and now has worked perfectly on grinding away a few bolts under my deck for replacment. Would 100% recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made and works fine
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot to say about a hand grinder, either it works (this one does, and perfectly well) or it doesn't. I think this is a good size for reaching mower blades and it does a good job bringing back the edge on them.
customer_reviews.author: Karl  Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He just loves it! He's a do-it-yourself guy and he has found all kinds of things to use this for. Black & Decker is a name I count on.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Black & Decker
customer_reviews.text: Metal construction and good weight. Handle is easily switched from side to side. Only con is that the chuck tool can't be attached to the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good basic grinder for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the discount tool store brands, It comes with one wheel, and the handle can move to either side. I would reccomend for the avarage DIY person.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Staisiunas

customer_reviews.title: Could not take out grinder
customer_reviews.text: Used about 4 times. When i went to remove the grinder it did not come out. Very disappointing as i have never had an issue with Black and Decker toold
customer_reviews.author: PAULA SALDARRIAGA

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made, functions as described, fits or otherwise conforms to it's intended purpose, there were NO negative issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: FINE
customer_reviews.text: IT HAS GREAT POWER TO CUT EVERYTHING.BUT IT'S NOISY BY THE FAST SPEED. BUT IT'S ACCEPTABLE. AND THIS IS THE MOST CHEAP ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonny Z.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas git for son in law
customer_reviews.text: This grinder was exactly what my son i law wanted, along with the extra grinding disc this made a perfect gift for him. The quality was excellent, good value for price paid
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Good, no frills grinder
customer_reviews.text: It's an angle grinder. I don't need anything hard-core so this worked for me at a price that is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Awaz

customer_reviews.title: Way more power then said
customer_reviews.text: Can't belive this is only 5.5 amps, it feels so powerful. Cuts through metal easily, grinds stuff down quickly etc etc. Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robb.M

customer_reviews.title: Works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Other people have said that it can over heat. I've used it for several minutes at a time and it's held out fine for me. It can chop through pipes and clean off rust. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: used to remove mortar and concrete it is very powerful and one must be very careful with these tools. always use eye and breathing protection
customer_reviews.author: NSA

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for the father...who has everything
customer_reviews.text: He has every tool, but said he needed a new one, and loves this one, but didn't expect the "upgrade" that I purchased for such a great price. Thanks to Amazon! Also came quickly and packed well.
customer_reviews.author: rdwc

customer_reviews.title: A helpful tool to have around anytime
customer_reviews.text: this has been a great tool, I do some repair of my farm equipment (more than I like) and this tool has been very handy to have around for sure
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dunford

customer_reviews.title: great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Even though the price was not of a quality tool I've found this item an excellent buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Armando Velarde

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I bought it for. Good workhorse. I was cutting cement pavers with it. Good product for the money. excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: wildak8246

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase in terms of speed of delivery and product specifications
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Zerpa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This little grinder works great and is easy to use. I used it for both cutting and grinding and it is easy to maneuver and easy to change accessories. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dean Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great little grinder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the little jobs and big projects, we are redoing our basement and fitting it out, and this it the perfect tool
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, high quality especially for the cost. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: nicholis r carstensen

customer_reviews.title: through the set time was fulfilled and I am happy with the item my son likes I highly recommend this shop is very responsible
customer_reviews.text: through the set time was fulfilled and I am happy with the item my son likes I highly recommend this shop is very responsible
customer_reviews.author: VE139482 LUIS HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you'd expect it to do. Single speed. Directions specifically say not to be used with cup type tools (like the most common accessory purchased with it, a cup-style wire brush) but they do bolt right up if you remove the wheel style adapter. I had no issues with current draw from a standard 110 outlet and used it with the wire-brush head to remove about ten years of undercarriage rust from a vehicle before painting. Excellent tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allerion

customer_reviews.title: Good for infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: I received an orange colored grinder. Not the black model shown in the picture. No big deal. It works OK. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: WORKS AS EXPECTED AND DOES A GOOD JOB HANDLES WELL AND EASY TO USE. GOOD QUALITY AT A REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: PEG

customer_reviews.title: great grinder perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: the grinder arrived as promised and works well i will use it till it drops lol I am a jeep after market builder and it is great
customer_reviews.author: jd stage 2 jeep

customer_reviews.title: It is well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a grinder for heavy duty work, Just occasional light duty grinding, and cleanup so this fits my needs very well
customer_reviews.author: DesertHowler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ITEM. I USE IT WHEN I DO SMALL WELDING JOBS.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind V. Doerdjan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...no problems or issues at all. Small, lightweight and with the right wheel on it does exactly what it's meant to do!
customer_reviews.author: oldmikey23

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my son. He says it does the job he expected it to complete
customer_reviews.author: Ma farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for home projects
customer_reviews.text: Fells like it has Lots of power. work great so far
customer_reviews.author: D Spaniard

customer_reviews.title: Great machine at an unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.text: This B & D angle grinder was just what I needed. An small efficient machine that takes the strain out of many tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Glen PK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤ it . Works great.i love Black and Decker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine for light use, buy a DeWalt if you plan on using a grinder a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: great tool. great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on impulse. found a few small jobs to use it on. It has enough power to grind off a few bolts in cement. So far happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jsc

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: The Black & Decker 7750 Small Angle Grinder is a very basic device, but if you're not a contractor and useit only from time to time it has all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hagen

customer_reviews.title: loved the grinder
customer_reviews.text: Yes, loved the grinder..price was affordable and received it in two days
customer_reviews.author: susan acheson

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: AS DESCRIBED AND DURABLE ENOUGH . WE DO SMALL JOBS AND HOME IMPROVEMENTS SO THIS WORKS GREAT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Shaniqua

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small grinder
customer_reviews.text: I just received this grinder which went up $5.00 since I bought it and I am very pleased with it. The size is about the same as a Clarke and the switch operates the same way (Slide on, Toggle off) but has better action, actually, VERY NICE ACTION, the best I have had with a small grinder. This seems to be a quality tool that will last a long time. Kudos to B&D for coming back from the brink.
customer_reviews.author: GearJunkyTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: but if it works fine team, I used to cut tubes and even ...
customer_reviews.text: I really have not used much, but if it works fine team, I used to cut tubes and even a pipe recessed in a wall of reinforced concrete, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spent a little on this little tool and saved a lot
customer_reviews.author: E Z Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power and easy to use. Great tool with a great price. It is such a pleasure to purchase with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J Tharp

customer_reviews.title: After months I am still happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great little Grinder, does the job and goes beyond expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so far.. I haven't had a chance to use it extensively, but it has performed well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It came right on time and as expected from Black & Decker it works great. I only used it for about a few hours and it held together overall it's a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: santiago

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: The kind of quality you would expect. from a Black and Decker product. Very well packaged and worked beautifully right out of the box with the included accessory blade.
customer_reviews.author: loenex1

customer_reviews.title: grinder is awesome
customer_reviews.text: i love these $30 grinders i have another one at my work (shipyard) ive been beating the s*** outta it for 9 months still working fine
customer_reviews.author: trevweld

customer_reviews.title: good production.
customer_reviews.text: right march with the price. well performance. I like it. i tried to use it in different way, it can be use as grinder, polisher, cutter etc. just $30
customer_reviews.author: H. ma

customer_reviews.title: a bit dissapointed bkuz it was a bday gift.
customer_reviews.text: My package was damaged looked like it had been opened & usedd. 😮
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item as a gift and it arrived right before the holidays, that is why I gave it 5 stars.

product_meta.title: Black & Decker 7750 4-1/2-Inch Small Angle Grinder
product_meta.description:
2561-2185 Features: -Metal gear shift adds increased durability and extended life.-Convenient slide switch and two-position handle add comfort and control for a wide range of applications.-Spindle lock holds the wheel in place for quick and easy accessory changes.-Tool is perfect for home projects such as sharpening, grinding, cutting, and more.-10,000 RPM. Includes: -Includes the 4-1/2'' grinder, metal grinding wheel, and spanner wrench. Specifications: -4-1/2'' small angle grinder offers a powerful 5.5 amp motor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The 7750 4-1/2-inch small angle grinder offers a powerful 5.5 amp motor that operates at 10,000 rpm. A metal gear case adds increased durability and extended life. A convenient slide switch and two-position handle add comfort and control for a wide range of applications. The spindle lock holds the wheel in place for quick and easy accessory changes. This versatile tool is perfect for home projects like sharpening, grinding, cutting, and more. The 7750 includes the 4-1/2-inch grinder, metal grinding wheel, and spanner wrench.
feature_bullets: Powerful 5.5 Amp motor; operates at 10,000 RPM
2-position side handle and contoured body grip for added comfort and control
Included with angle grinder: metal grinding wheel and spanner wrench
Included Components: 4-1/2" Small angle grinder, Metal grinding wheel, Spanner wrench

specifications.Included Components: 4-1/2" Small angle grinderMetal grinding wheelSpanner wrench
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
